languages.text: "Прекрати отпираться, Иеронимус. Признай, наконец, что вера твоя не так крепка как ты думал, и Император не защитит тебя от костра палачихи".
"Stop denying it, Hieronymus. Admit, once and for all, that your faith is not as strong as you thought it was, and that the Emperor will not protect you from the murderous zealot's fire."
languages.original_text: "Прекрати отпираться, Иеронимус. Признай, наконец, что вера твоя не так крепка как ты думал, и Император не защитит тебя от костра палачихи".

traits.locale_text: "Stop denying it, Hieronymus. Admit already that your faith is not as strong as you thought it was, and that the Emperor will not protect you from the murderous zealot's fire."
"Stop denying it, Hieronymus. Admit already that your faith is not as strong as you thought it was, and that the Emperor will not protect you from the murderous zealot's fire."
"Stop denying it, Hieronymus. Admit already that your faith is not as strong as you thought it was, and that the Emperor will not protect you from the murderous zealot's fire."
"Stop denying it, Hieronymus. Admit already that your faith is not as strong as you thought it was, and that the Emperor will not protect you from the murderous zealot's fire."
"Stop denying it, Hieronymus. Admit, once and for all, that your faith is not as strong as you thought it was, and that the Emperor will not protect you from the murderous zealot's fire."
"Stop denying it, Hieronymus. Admit, once and for all, that your faith is not as strong as you thought it was, and that the Emperor will not protect you from the murderous zealot's fire."

languages.text: “别再否认了，希罗尼穆斯。赶紧承认吧，你的信仰并不像你想象得那么坚定，帝皇无法保护你免受那个狂热分子的火刑。”
languages.original_text: "Stop denying it, Hieronymus. Admit, once and for all, that your faith is not as strong as you thought it was, and that the Emperor will not protect you from the murderous zealot's fire."

traits.locale_text: “别再否认了，希罗尼穆斯。承认吧，你的信仰并不像你想象得那么坚定，帝皇无法保护你免受那个狂热分子的火刑。”

languages.text: 「ヒエロニムス、否定をするのは止めろ。自分で思っていたほどお前の信念は強くなかった。そして皇帝は殺人狂の炎からお前を守ってくれないということを、きっぱりと認めるんだ」
languages.original_text: "Stop denying it, Hieronymus. Admit, once and for all, that your faith is not as strong as you thought it was, and that the Emperor will not protect you from the murderous zealot's fire."

traits.locale_text: 「ヒエロニムス、否定をするのは止めろ。自分で思っていたほどお前の信念は強くなかった。そして皇帝は殺人狂の炎からお前を守ってくれないということを、きっぱりと認めるんだ」

languages.text: «Deje de negarlo, Hieronymus. Admita de una vez que su fe no es tan fuerte como creía y que el Emperador no le protegerá del fuego de la fanática asesina».
languages.original_text: "Stop denying it, Hieronymus. Admit, once and for all, that your faith is not as strong as you thought it was, and that the Emperor will not protect you from the murderous zealot's fire."

traits.locale_text: «Deje de negarlo, Hieronymus. Admita de una vez que su fe no es tan fuerte como creía y que el Emperador no le protegerá del fuego de la fanática asesina».

languages.text: "Hört auf, es zu leugnen, Hieronymus. Gebt ein für alle Mal zu, dass Euer Glaube nicht so stark ist, wie Ihr dachtet. Und dass der Imperator Euch nicht vor dem Feuer der mörderischen Fanatikerin beschützen wird."
languages.original_text: "Stop denying it, Hieronymus. Admit, once and for all, that your faith is not as strong as you thought it was, and that the Emperor will not protect you from the murderous zealot's fire."

traits.locale_text: "Hört auf, es zu leugnen, Hieronymus. Gebt endlich zu, dass Euer Glaube nicht so stark ist, wie Ihr dachtet. Und dass der Imperator Euch nicht vor dem Feuer der mörderischen Fanatikerin beschützen wird."

languages.text: « Inutile de le nier, Hiéronymus. Admettez une fois pour toutes que votre foi est loin d'être aussi inébranlable que vous le prétendez, et que l'Empereur ne vous protégera pas du feu purificateur de votre zélote meurtrière. »
languages.original_text: "Stop denying it, Hieronymus. Admit, once and for all, that your faith is not as strong as you thought it was, and that the Emperor will not protect you from the murderous zealot's fire."

traits.locale_text: « Inutile de le nier, Hiéronymus. Admettez que votre foi est loin d'être aussi inébranlable que vous le prétendez, et que l'Empereur ne vous protégera pas du feu purificateur de votre zélote meurtrière. »

languages.text: "İnkâr etmeyi bırak Hieronymus. İtiraf etme zamanı. İnancın, artık sandığın kadar güçlü değil. İmparator seni o bağnaz caninin ateşinden korumayacak."
languages.original_text: "Stop denying it, Hieronymus. Admit, once and for all, that your faith is not as strong as you thought it was, and that the Emperor will not protect you from the murderous zealot's fire."

traits.locale_text: "İnkâr etmeyi bırak Hieronymus. İtiraf etme zamanı. İnancın, artık sandığın kadar güçlü değil ve İmparator seni o bağnaz caninin ateşinden korumayacak."
